name: Death Breath: stress of the chin diper
name_original: Death Breath: stress of the chin diper
description:
Explanaiton - the purpose of the game is the gain points, you lose points as long as the as there isn't a black aura around you, in order to remove the aura you need to come close to people and talk to them, but every time you do come to people you have a chance of getting infected, if you get infected then you can no longer gain points and you lose the game. 

Analysation - the game is designed to deliver the expirience of what it feels like to be at high risk of covid, the black aura is supposed to symbolise depression caused by isolation and the way that the game traps the player in a situation that forced them to either risk losing points or risk getting infected is parallel to the risks dealt during the covid pandemic.

Rules and keys - characters with red auras are not wearing a mask, characters are wearing a mask, characters that are wearing a mask have a lower chance of infecting you if come closer to them, black squiggles to the sides of the character indicate that you got infected, the coughing animation of a character is the character's sprite being squishes horizontally for a few seconds. you move with the arrow keys, wasd, left joystick on the xbox controller and d-pad on the xbox controller, talk with space, enter, a and x on the xbox controller, run with shift or the bumpers on the xbox controller.

Developer - A.I, also know as doctor bronze, https://twitter.com/doctor_bronze

Character artist - Lemon https://www.tiktok.com/@nyanbinaryroxy?_d=secCgYIASAHKAESMgowg7APTL%2B1cZlb3iLSx...

This is simply a prototype, if enough people will like this then i will develop a commercialised version.
